title: Campionidee Lay
body:
Lay 
						
		Q:     He jump to enemy and hits him      

		W:    He throws a comet and 
			   slows an enemy down.		 

		E:     He lets down a meteor from 
			   the sky. When he hits               
			   an enemy, then he marks him. 

		R:     When an enemy is marked,
			    then he can jump to him
			    and hits him up and the
			    orange sign blows up.       
			         	     
		P:       His first hit of vassal and 
		          monsters is a critical hit.    
																	
					
	Results
Time:  Q=15/14/12/11/10,5
		W=7/6/5,5/5/4
            E=13/12/10/9,5/9	
	    	R=60/55/50	   	     

Mana:  Q=	50/60/65/70/75		   
		W=60/65/70/75/80
		E =	80/85/90/95/100	
		R =100/110/120

Damage: 
Q=60 D per LvL more 3
W=50 D per LvL more: 10 
E=40 D per LvL more: 15  
R=150 D per LvL more: 20

escalate:
Q: normal Damage 90 %
W: ability Power 40 %  
E: ability Power 70 %
R: ability Power 70 %

quickness: 330    



autoattack damage more per lvl: +4
speedattack more per lvl:0
magic resistance more per lvl: 0,5
armor more per lvl: 0,7

initial values autoattack damage: 50
initial values speedattack:  0,80           
initial values magic resistance: 13
initial values armor: 15


Man spielt ihn Jungel mit {{summoner:11}} und {{summoner:6}}  
oder top mit {{summoner:12}} und {{summoner:6}} 

Er countert {{champion:80}} ; {{champion:150}} . (; 
{{champion:86}} ; {{champion:266}} und {{champion:86}} können Lay leicht countern
  



From :  Blackhero1412
To :       League of Legends

replies.body: Wir könnten eher mehr ADC's gebrauchen, Jungler gibts ja schon einige :P

wenn irgendjemand mit einem Blackhawk1404 spielt bitte reportet ihn !!!!!!!
bitte,bitte,bitte{{item:2010}}
